r.d: Allow one to use htaccess-like file to configure PHP per directory, just like apache's htaccess. It is especially useful with fastcgi. This package was originally developed by Bart Vanbrabant. Old versions are available from: http://files.zoeloelip.be/htscanner
r.n: - #9672, erroneous ini value length - Replace request and module init fatal errors by warnings - The None value is now case insentive, like in php.ini - do not use REPORT_ERRORS while trying to open a config file - Added a note in README to compile for apache when mod_access and php are present
